entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
